b - Variable in class cip.render.utilColour.RGBf
 
Blinn - Class in cip.render.raytrace.material
This is an implementation of the Blinn illumination model as described in Blinn, James F (1977), "Models of Light Reflection for Computer Synthesized Images", ACM Computer Graphics, (SIGGRAPH 77), vol 11, no 2, pp.92-198.
Blinn() - Constructor for class cip.render.raytrace.material.Blinn
Creates a new instance of the Blinn illumination model.
Blinn(String, RGBf, boolean, AngleF) - Constructor for class cip.render.raytrace.material.Blinn
Creates a new instance of the Blinn illumination model.
Blinn - Class in cip.render.raytrace.material.D
The cosine power slope-distribution function introduced by Blinn as D = (N.H)Ns.
Blinn() - Constructor for class cip.render.raytrace.material.D.Blinn
Creates a new instance of Blinn cosine power slope distribution function.
